## Quality Checklist

- [ ] Primary source (paper, official docs, or practitioner experience)
- [ ] Contains real implementation insights (not just conceptual overview)
- [ ] Link is accessible and working
- [ ] Not AI-generated content without significant human verification
- [ ] Adds unique value not covered by existing resources
